bibl.title: Exits and Entrances in Menander. (Oxford Classical and Philosophical Monographs.)

C.R. par W. Geoffrey Arnott, CR N.S., 39 (1989) pp. 385-386. - Christina Dedoussi, LCM 14 (1989) pp. 72-76. - N.J. Lowe, JHS 109 (1989) pp. 229-230. - Mark Damen, CJ 87 (1991-1992) pp. 200-203. - Dwora Gilula, Athenaeum 79 (1991) pp. 678-679. - Slater, Arion 1 (1991) No. 3, pp. 195-201 (non vidimus).
